headline: PM-KISAN Launched Rs 6000 Annual Support to Farmers
Scheme Extended to All Farmers Irrespective of Land
10 Crore Farmers Receive COVID Front-Loaded Payment
Cumulative Disbursement Crosses Rs 1 Lakh Crore
eKYC Verification Removes 2.3 Crore Ineligible Accounts
Database Cleanup Results in Genuine 8.12 Crore Farmers
Rs 3.45 Lakh Crore Total Disbursed Since Launch
